experiences.title: ClickFunnels Platform Reliability Engineer by Codeminer42
experiences.subtitle: Platform Reliability Engineer
workDescription: Working as a platform reliability engineer in a platform with thousands of users, I improved and optimized features, created and implemented instrumentation tools (integrating with New Relic), and developed system tests for complex features. The most common technologies used were Kafka, Rails, PostgreSQL, Sidekiq, New Relic, and Circle CI.

experiences.title: Agrisafe Software engineer by Codeminer 42
experiences.subtitle: Software engineer
workDescription:
I worked as a lead backend developer, focusing on design, development, developer training, and recruitment. I used key technologies including Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, Sidekiq, and geospatial data processing tools like Geokit and Geocoder. Additionally, I managed service configuration and administration using GitLab CI, GitHub Actions, and Heroku.
 The features I developed included integrating with APIs from major companies such as the Brazilian stock exchange and payment gateways, used by leading financial entities in Brazil

experiences.title: A.karta Software developer by Codeminer 42
experiences.subtitle: Software engineer
workDescription: I worked as a lead developer, operating full-stack in frontend and backend design and development. The features developed included asynchronous services using Sidekiq and Rails. In addition to development, I managed the system infrastructure, involving GitLab CI and Heroku.

experiences.title: Free-lancer developer
experiences.subtitle: NPX imóveis
workDescription: I freelanced on the development of a real estate Marketplace platform tailored exclusively for real estate brokers, operating on a subscription-based model. My responsibilities encompassed leading the team, full-stack development, and direct client interaction. I contributed to feature planning and development using Laravel, MySQL, Bootstrap, and integrated Machine Learning technologies with Python.
